articles.description: Jacqui Smith has spoken about becoming the first celebrity to be eliminated from this year's Strictly Come Dancing, in a joint interview with pro partner Anton du Beke.
articles.content:
Jacqui Smith has spoken about becoming the first celebrity to be eliminated from this year's Strictly Come Dancing, in a joint interview with pro partner Anton du Beke.
